setting.title: Whatsapp Report
setting.columnlabels: Client,Contact Person,Mobile No,Email Id,Start Date,End Date,Assigned To,Status
setting.query: select $COLUMNS$ from ( select case when isnull(contacts_mobileno,'')='' then '' when contacts_mobileno like '91%' then contacts_mobileno else '91'+contacts_mobileno end as mobileno, * from tbl_client left JOIN tbl_contacts on contacts_clientid=client_clientid LEFT JOIN tbl_employee on employee_employeeid=client_employeeid join tbl_subscriptionstatus on subscriptionstatus_subscriptionstatusid=client_subscriptionstatusid )r2 $CheckPermission$
setting.where:
isnull(contacts_mobileno,'')<>'' AND contacts_iswhatsappcommunication=1 AND ('$client_clientid$' = '0' OR client_clientid = '$client_clientid$') AND ('$client_startdate_from$' ='' OR client_startdate BETWEEN '$client_startdate_from$' AND '$client_startdate_to$') AND ('$client_whatsappenddate_from$' ='' OR client_whatsappenddate BETWEEN '$client_whatsappenddate_from$' AND '$client_whatsappenddate_to$') AND ('$client_employeeid$' = '0' OR client_employeeid = '$client_employeeid$')
AND ( ('$client_subscriptionstatusid$' = '0' AND cast(client_whatsappenddate as date)>=cast(getdate() as date)) OR ('$client_subscriptionstatusid$'='1' and client_subscriptionstatusid in(1,3) AND cast(client_whatsappenddate as date)>=cast(getdate() as date)) OR ('$client_subscriptionstatusid$'='2' and client_subscriptionstatusid in(2,4) AND cast(client_whatsappenddate as date)>=cast(getdate() as date)) OR ('$client_subscriptionstatusid$'='3' and client_subscriptionstatusid in(1,3) AND cast(client_whatsappenddate as date)<=cast(getdate() as date)) OR ('$client_subscriptionstatusid$'='4' and client_subscriptionstatusid in(2,4) AND cast(client_whatsappenddate as date)<=cast(getdate() as date)) )
